page.title: 02SUSAN,AGE TEN,LOWER PENARTH.
page.content: At 7.30,I get up,shower,and at once I feel better.I read my book,mum shouts, I'm late for breakfast.At the table I join in the argument.Breakfast has always been cereal and jam on toast since I was five.I brush my hair,clean my teeth and I'm ready."Oh no!my lunch bag and pencil case."At school a bell rings,9.00,a reading lesson begins.We have Maths and English in the morning. At 10.00 is school assembly,we see a play by Class 8 on Rules in Sport.We play Fireball at break,passing a ball, if it's dropped we run around.Thank goodness,we missed Welsh today!After lunch,we walk to Cosmeston and study a hedgerow.Back in school,half the class play rounders,others practice sports. 3.25,only 5 minutes to the bell.Tea is pizza and garlic bread,after washing dishes,I go swimming.Then watch TV or play on my computer in my blue bedroom
